location: 隱士林 (Yin Shi Lin) residential complex
notes: This is a luxury high-rise apartment in a well-maintained modern complex with grand entrance, landscaped courtyards, and reflecting pool. The interior shows clean modern finishes with polished tile floors, recessed lighting, marble TV feature wall, and AC. For baby safety, the common areas have water features and stairs that require supervision; interior appears single-level with no visible sharp hazards. Good natural light from multiple windows.
